content: Hey guys!We are thrilled to announce MegaPari’s first lottery designed specifically for the Bitcointalk community!We would like to thank you all who are helping to create a valuable community around one of the most promising iGaming brand.You are welcome to make deposits on the  MegaPari gambling&betting platform  with any payment method you like within 7 days. Each Monday we choose one winner who will receive 50$ on their BTC wallet.We do not set any specific timeframe for the campaign - the more users engage, the more rounds will we play. Let the lottery begin! Follow the steps below and we are waiting for your applications.Cheers! How to take part:1. Register and fill in all the personal information fields in My Account.2. Make a deposit of at least 5 USD (or equivalent in another currency).3. Make a screenshot of your deposit.4. Post your account ID, the screenshot of your deposit and the BTC wallet address below.5. Applications for one round are accepted from Monday till Sunday 23.59 (GMT+3).6. We pick a winner each week on Monday 14.00 (GMT+3). The winner is to receive the award within max. 72 hours in BTC. Terms&Conditions:1. Deposits are allowed both in fiat and crypto.2. Your participation in the lottery can be mixed with usage of other bonuses and promotions of the MegaPari company.3. Only one award is allowed per customer, address, shared computer, shared IP address, and any identical account details including e-mail address, payment details etc during the whole run of the lottery campaign. We reserve the right to amend the award in case of violation of the rule.4. We require minimum 5 participants a week to make the giveaway possible.  Any questions regarding the event?Feel free to ask on our ANN thread to keep this topic clean.
